sentences.zh: 王者制事立法，物度軌則，壹稟於六律，六律為萬事根本焉。

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.
translations.idiomatic: Kings establish affairs and make laws; things have measures and rules; all receive from the six pitches; the six pitches are the root of ten thousand affairs.

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.

sentences.zh: 其於兵械尤所重，故云「望敵知吉凶，聞聲效勝負」，百王不易之道也。

translations.literal: Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.
translations.idiomatic: They regard weapons especially heavily, therefore it is said: 'Look at the enemy and know good and bad; hear the sound and know victory and defeat'—this is the unchanging way of the hundred kings.

translations.literal: Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.

sentences.zh: 武王伐紂，吹律聽聲，推孟春以至于季冬，殺氣相并，而音尚宮。

translations.literal: Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong.
translations.idiomatic: When King Wu attacked Zhou, he blew the pitches and listened to the sound, from the first month of spring to the last month of winter; the killing qi mutually combined, yet the sound still favored gong.

sentences.zh: 同聲相從，物之自然，何足怪哉？

translations.literal: Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?
translations.idiomatic: Like sounds follow each other; this is the natural way of things—what is there to wonder at?

translations.literal: Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong. Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?

sentences.zh: 兵者，聖人所以討彊暴，平亂世，夷險阻，救危殆。

translations.literal: Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis.
translations.idiomatic: Weapons are what sages use to punish the strong and violent, pacify chaotic ages, level dangerous obstacles, and save perilous crises.

sentences.zh: 自含（血）［齒］戴角之獸見犯則校，而況於人懷好惡喜怒之氣？

translations.literal: From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi?
translations.idiomatic: Even beasts that have teeth and wear horns will fight when they see violation; how much more so for people who harbor qi of likes and dislikes, happiness and anger?

sentences.zh: 喜則愛心生，怒則毒螫加，情性之理也。

translations.literal: Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.
translations.idiomatic: When happy, a loving heart is born; when angry, poisonous stings are added—this is the principle of feelings and nature.

translations.literal: Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis. From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi? Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.

sentences.zh: 昔黃帝有涿鹿之戰，以定火災；

translations.literal: Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster;
translations.idiomatic: In former times, the Yellow Emperor had the battle at Zhuolu to settle the fire disaster;

sentences.zh: 顓頊有共工之陳，以平水害；

translations.literal: Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm;
translations.idiomatic: Zhuan Xu had the battle array against Gong Gong to pacify the water harm;

sentences.zh: 成湯有南巢之伐，以殄夏亂。

translations.literal: Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos.
translations.idiomatic: Cheng Tang had the attack on Nan Chao to exterminate Xia chaos.

sentences.zh: 遞興遞廢，勝者用事，所受於天也。

translations.literal: Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.
translations.idiomatic: They successively rise and successively are discarded; victors handle affairs—what is received from heaven.

translations.literal: Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster; Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm; Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos. Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，名士迭興，晉用咎犯，而齊用王子，吳用孫武，申明軍約，賞罰必信，卒伯諸侯，兼列邦土，雖不及三代之誥誓，然身寵君尊，當世顯揚，可不謂榮焉？

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious?
translations.idiomatic: From this time after, famous scholars successively rose; Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declaring army covenants, rewards and punishments must be trustworthy, finally becoming hegemon over the feudal lords, annexing the lands of the column states. Though not reaching the announcements and oaths of the Three Dynasties, yet their bodies were honored and lords respected, contemporary illustrious and praised—can this not be called glorious?

sentences.zh: 豈與世儒闇於大較，不權輕重，猥云德化，不當用兵，大至君辱失守，小乃侵犯削弱，遂執不移等哉！

translations.literal: How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc!
translations.idiomatic: How is this comparable to worldly Confucians who are dark about the great outline, do not weigh light and heavy, vilely speak of virtue transformation, say it is not appropriate to use troops? In great cases, the lord is insulted and loses his defense; in small cases, they are invaded, diminished, and weakened, then they hold to not moving and so on!

sentences.zh: 笔教笞不可廢於家，刑罰不可捐於國，誅伐不可偃於天下，用之有巧拙，行之有逆順耳。

translations.literal: Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.
translations.idiomatic: Writing instruction and the cane cannot be discarded in the home; punishments cannot be abandoned in the state; executions cannot cease in the world. Using them has skillful and clumsy; carrying them out has reverse and proper—that is all.

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious? How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc! Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.

sentences.zh: 夏桀、殷紂手搏豺狼，足追四馬，勇非微也；

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight;
translations.idiomatic: Xia Jie and Yin Zhou wrestled wolves and boars with their hands, pursued four horses with their feet—their bravery was not slight;

sentences.zh: 百戰克勝，諸侯懾服，權非輕也。

translations.literal: Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light.
translations.idiomatic: In a hundred battles they were victorious; the feudal lords were awed and submitted—their power was not light.

sentences.zh: 秦二世宿軍無用之地，連兵於邊陲，力非弱也；

translations.literal: Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak;
translations.idiomatic: Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops in useless places, connected troops at the borders—their strength was not weak;

sentences.zh: 結怨匈奴，絓禍於越，勢非寡也。

translations.literal: Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few.
translations.idiomatic: They tied resentment with the Xiongnu, entangled calamity with Yue—their momentum was not few.

sentences.zh: 及其威盡勢極，閭巷之人為敵國，咎生窮武之不知足，甘得之心不息也。

translations.literal: When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.
translations.idiomatic: When their authority was exhausted and momentum extreme, even alley people became enemy states. The fault was born from exhausting martial affairs without knowing sufficiency; the heart that sweetly desired gain did not rest.

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight; Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light. Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak; Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few. When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.

sentences.zh: 高祖有天下，三邊外畔；

translations.literal: Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled;
translations.idiomatic: When Gao Zu had the world, the three borders rebelled outside;

sentences.zh: 大國之王雖稱蕃輔，臣節未盡。

translations.literal: Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete.
translations.idiomatic: The kings of the great states, though called auxiliary support, did not complete their minister conduct.

sentences.zh: 會高祖厭苦軍事，亦有蕭、張之謀，故偃武一休息，羈縻不備。

translations.literal: Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.
translations.idiomatic: When Gao Zu became weary and bitter of military affairs, he also had the plans of Xiao and Zhang, therefore he ceased martial affairs for one rest, restrained and was not prepared.

translations.literal: Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled; Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete. Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.

sentences.zh: 歷至孝文即位，將軍陳武等議曰：「南越、朝鮮自全秦時內屬為臣子，後且擁兵阻阸，選蠕觀望。

translations.literal: Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching.
translations.idiomatic: Continuing until Xiao Wen ascended the throne, generals Chen Wu and others discussed, saying: 'Nan Yue and Chao Xian from the complete Qin time belonged within as minister children; afterward they moreover held troops and blocked the passes, wriggling and watching.'

sentences.zh: 高祖時天下新定，人民小安，未可復興兵。

translations.literal: Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops.
translations.idiomatic: In Gao Zu's time, the world was newly settled; the people had small peace—it was not possible to again raise troops.

sentences.zh: 今陛下仁惠撫百姓，恩澤加海內，宜及士民樂用，征討逆黨，以一封疆。」

translations.literal: Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.'
translations.idiomatic: Now Your Majesty is benevolent and gracious in caressing the hundred families; favor and moisture are added within the seas. It is appropriate to reach the scholar people who happily use this to attack and exterminate the rebellious parties, to unify the borders.'

sentences.zh: 孝文曰：「朕能任衣冠，念不到此。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this.
translations.idiomatic: Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear the robe and hat; my thought does not reach this.'

sentences.zh: 會呂氏之亂，功臣宗室共不羞恥，誤居正位，常戰戰慄慄，恐事之不終。

translations.literal: Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end.
translations.idiomatic: When the chaos of the Lu clan occurred, the merit ministers and clan relatives together were not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling and apprehensive, fearing that affairs would not end.

sentences.zh: 且兵凶器，雖克所願，動亦秏病，謂百姓遠方何？

translations.literal: Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what?
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, troops are ominous instruments; though they conquer as wished, moving them also exhausts and sickens—what about the hundred families in far places?

sentences.zh: 又先帝知勞民不可煩，故不以為意。

translations.literal: Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent.
translations.idiomatic: Also, the former emperor knew that toiling the people cannot be troublesome, therefore he did not take it as his intent.

sentences.zh: 朕豈自謂能？

translations.literal: I how self say able?
translations.idiomatic: How could I myself claim to be able?

sentences.zh: 今匈奴內侵，軍吏無功，邊民父子荷兵日久，朕常為動心傷痛，無日忘之。

translations.literal: Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget.
translations.idiomatic: Now the Xiongnu invade within; army officials have no merit; border people, fathers and sons, carry weapons for long days. I am constantly moved in heart and pained by this; there is no day I forget it.

sentences.zh: 今未能銷距，願且堅邊設候，結和通使，休寧北陲，為功多矣。

translations.literal: Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many.
translations.idiomatic: Now I cannot dissolve the defense; I wish moreover to strengthen the borders and set scouts, tie peace and connect envoys, rest and pacify the northern borders—this would be merit enough.

sentences.zh: 且無議軍。」

translations.literal: Moreover no discuss troops.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, do not discuss troops.'

sentences.zh: 故百姓無內外之繇，得息肩於田畝，天下殷富，粟至十餘錢，鳴雞吠狗，煙火萬里，可謂和樂者乎！

translations.literal: Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, the hundred families had no inner or outer corvee, got to rest their shoulders at the fields. The world was prosperous and rich; grain reached ten-plus cash. Crowing cocks and barking dogs, smoke fires for ten thousand li—can this be called harmonious and happy!

translations.literal: Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching. Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops. Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.' Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this. Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end. Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what? Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent. I how self say able? Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget. Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many. Moreover no discuss troops.' Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：文帝時，會天下新去湯火，人民樂業，因其欲然，能不擾亂，故百姓遂安。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: In Emperor Wen's time, the world had newly left the cauldrons and fires; the people took joy in their occupations. He followed their wishes thus, could not disturb and cause chaos, therefore the hundred families then became peaceful.

sentences.zh: 自年六七十翁亦未嘗至市井，游敖嬉戲如小兒狀。

translations.literal: From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance.
translations.idiomatic: Even old men of sixty to seventy years had not tasted going to the markets and wells; they roamed, played, and frolicked like children in appearance.

sentences.zh: 孔子所稱有德君子者邪！

translations.literal: Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!
translations.idiomatic: These are what Confucius called the virtuous gentlemen!

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful. From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance. Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!

sentences.zh: 《書》曰［七正］，二十八舍。

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges.
translations.idiomatic: The Book says: seven correct, twenty-eight lodges.

sentences.zh: 律歷，天所以通五行八正之氣，天所以成孰萬物也。

translations.literal: Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things.
translations.idiomatic: The pitch calendar is heaven's means to connect the qi of the five phases and eight correct; heaven's means to complete and ripen the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 舍者，日月所舍。

translations.literal: Lodges, sun moon lodged.
translations.idiomatic: Lodges are where the sun and moon lodge.

sentences.zh: 舍者，舒氣也。

translations.literal: Lodges, loose qi.
translations.idiomatic: Lodges are where qi is loosened.

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges. Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things. Lodges, sun moon lodged. Lodges, loose qi.

sentences.zh: 不周風居西北，主殺生。

translations.literal: Not Zhou wind dwells northwest, governs killing birth.
translations.idiomatic: The Bu Zhou wind dwells in the northwest, governs killing and giving birth.

sentences.zh: 東壁居不周風東，主辟生氣而東之。

translations.literal: Dong Bi dwells Not Zhou wind east, governs open birth qi east it.
translations.idiomatic: Dong Bi dwells east of the Bu Zhou wind, governs opening the birth qi and directing it east.

sentences.zh: 至於營室。

translations.literal: To Ying Shi.
translations.idiomatic: Reaching Ying Shi.

sentences.zh: 營室者，主營胎陽氣而產之。

translations.literal: Ying Shi, governs camp fetal yang qi produce it.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Shi governs camping the fetal yang qi and producing it.

sentences.zh: 東至于危。

translations.literal: East to Wei.
translations.idiomatic: East to Wei.

sentences.zh: 危，垝也。

translations.literal: Wei, wei.
translations.idiomatic: Wei means gui.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣之（危）垝，故曰危。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi wei wei, thus called Wei.
translations.idiomatic: Speaking of the yang qi being gui, therefore it is called Wei.

sentences.zh: 十月也，律中應鐘。

translations.literal: Tenth month, pitch middle Ying Zhong.
translations.idiomatic: It is the tenth month; the pitch is middle Ying Zhong.

sentences.zh: 應鐘者，陽氣之應，不用事也。

translations.literal: Ying Zhong, yang qi response, not use affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Zhong is the response of yang qi; affairs are not used.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為亥。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Hai.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches, it is Hai.

sentences.zh: 亥者，該也。

translations.literal: Hai, contain.
translations.idiomatic: Hai means gai.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣藏於下，故該也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi store at below, thus contain.
translations.idiomatic: Speaking of yang qi being stored below, therefore gai.

translations.literal: Not Zhou wind dwells northwest, governs killing birth. Dong Bi dwells Not Zhou wind east, governs open birth qi east it. To Ying Shi. Ying Shi, governs camp fetal yang qi produce it. East to Wei. Wei, wei. Speak yang qi wei wei, thus called Wei. Tenth month, pitch middle Ying Zhong. Ying Zhong, yang qi response, not use affairs. Its at twelve branches for Hai. Hai, contain. Speak yang qi store at below, thus contain.

sentences.zh: 廣莫風居北方。

translations.literal: Guang Mo wind dwells north.
translations.idiomatic: The Guang Mo wind dwells in the north.

sentences.zh: 廣莫者，言陽氣在下，陰莫陽廣大也，故曰廣莫。

translations.literal: Guang Mo, speak yang qi at below, yin cannot yang vast great, thus Guang Mo.
translations.idiomatic: Guang Mo speaks of yang qi being below; yin cannot make yang vast and great, therefore it is called Guang Mo.

sentences.zh: 東至於虛。

translations.literal: East to Xu.
translations.idiomatic: East to Xu.

sentences.zh: 虛者，能實能虛，言陽氣冬則宛藏於虛，日冬至則一陰下藏，一陽上舒，故曰虛。

translations.literal: Xu, able solid able empty, speak yang qi winter then curl store at xu, winter solstice then one yin below store, one yang above stretch, thus Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Xu is able to be solid and able to be empty; speaking of yang qi in winter then curling and storing at xu; at the winter solstice then one yin stores below, one yang stretches above, therefore it is called Xu.

sentences.zh: 東至于須女。

translations.literal: East to Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: East to Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 言萬物變動其所，陰陽氣未相離，尚相［如］胥［如］也，故曰須女。

translations.literal: Speak ten thousand things change their place, yin yang qi not yet separate, still mutually like xu like, thus Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: Speaking of the ten thousand things changing their places, yin and yang qi not yet separating, still mutually like xu like, therefore it is called Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 十一月也，律中黃鐘。

translations.literal: Eleventh month, pitch middle Huang Zhong.
translations.idiomatic: It is the eleventh month; the pitch is middle Huang Zhong.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘者，陽氣踵黃泉而出也。

translations.literal: Huang Zhong, yang qi follow yellow springs exit.
translations.idiomatic: Huang Zhong is yang qi following the yellow springs and emerging.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為子。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Zi.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches, it is Zi.

sentences.zh: 子者，滋也；

translations.literal: Zi, nourish;
translations.idiomatic: Zi means nourish;

sentences.zh: 滋者，言萬物滋於下也。

translations.literal: Nourish, speak ten thousand things nourish at below.
translations.idiomatic: Nourish speaks of the ten thousand things being nourished below.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為壬癸。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers for Ren Gui.
translations.idiomatic: Among the ten mothers, it is Ren Gui.

sentences.zh: 壬之為言任也，言陽氣任養萬物於下也。

translations.literal: Ren speak, Ren, speak yang qi Ren nourish ten thousand things at below.
translations.idiomatic: Ren speaks of Ren; speaking of yang qi taking responsibility to nourish the ten thousand things below.

sentences.zh: 癸之為言揆也，言萬物可揆度，故曰癸。

translations.literal: Gui speak, Kui, speak ten thousand things can Kui measure, thus Gui.
translations.idiomatic: Gui speaks of Kui; speaking of the ten thousand things being able to be measured, therefore it is called Gui.

sentences.zh: 東至牽牛。

translations.literal: East to Qian Niu.
translations.idiomatic: East to Qian Niu.

sentences.zh: 牽牛者，言陽氣牽引萬物出之也。

translations.literal: Qian Niu, speak yang qi qian lead ten thousand things exit them.
translations.idiomatic: Qian Niu speaks of yang qi leading and drawing out the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 牛者，冒也，言地雖凍，能冒而生也。

translations.literal: Niu, cover, speak earth though freeze, able cover born.
translations.idiomatic: Niu means cover; speaking of the earth though frozen, being able to cover and give birth.

sentences.zh: 牛者，耕植種萬物也。

translations.literal: Niu, plow plant sow ten thousand things.
translations.idiomatic: Niu is to plow, plant, and sow the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 東至於建星。

translations.literal: East to Jian Xing.
translations.idiomatic: East to Jian Xing.

sentences.zh: 建星者，建諸生也。

translations.literal: Jian Xing, jian various born.
translations.idiomatic: Jian Xing establishes the various born things.

sentences.zh: 十二月也，律中大呂。

sentences.zh: 神生於無，形成於有，形然後數，形而成聲，故曰神使氣，氣就形。

translations.literal: Spirit born from nothing, form formed from something, form then numbers, form then sound, thus spirit makes qi, qi goes to form.
translations.idiomatic: The spirit is born from nothingness, form is formed from something; after form comes numbers, after form comes sound. Therefore it is said that the spirit directs qi, and qi conforms to form.

sentences.zh: 形理如類有可類。

translations.literal: Form principle like category has can category.
translations.idiomatic: Form and principle are like categories; there are categories that can be categorized.

sentences.zh: 或未形而未類，或同形而同類，類而可班，類而可識。

translations.literal: Some not yet form not yet category, some same form same category, category can rank, category can identify.
translations.idiomatic: Some things are not yet formed and not yet categorized; some have the same form and same category. When categorized, they can be ranked; when categorized, they can be identified.

sentences.zh: 聖人知天地識之別，故從有以至未有，以得細若氣，微若聲。

translations.literal: Sage know heaven earth know distinction, thus from have reach not have, with get fine like qi, subtle like sound.
translations.idiomatic: The sage knows the distinction between heaven and earth, therefore he proceeds from the existent to the nonexistent, thereby obtaining what is as fine as qi and as subtle as sound.

sentences.zh: 然聖人因神而存之，雖妙必效情，核其華道者明矣。

translations.literal: Yet sage according spirit store it, though wonderful must effect feelings, examine its flower way clear.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the sage preserves it through the spirit; though marvelous, it must conform to feelings. Those who examine its flowery way will understand clearly.

sentences.zh: 非有聖心以乘聰明，孰能存天地之神而成形之情哉？

translations.literal: Not have sage heart to ride intelligence, who can store heaven earth spirit and complete form feelings?
translations.idiomatic: If not for the sage heart riding on intelligence, who could preserve the spirit of heaven and earth and complete the feelings of form?

sentences.zh: 神者，物受之而不能知（及）其去來，故聖人畏而欲存之。

translations.literal: Spirit, things receive it cannot know its go come, thus sage fear desire store it.
translations.idiomatic: The spirit—things receive it but cannot know its comings and goings. Therefore the sage fears it and desires to preserve it.

sentences.zh: 唯欲存之，神之亦存。

translations.literal: Only desire store it, spirit it also store.
translations.idiomatic: Only desiring to preserve it, the spirit also preserves.

sentences.zh: 其欲存之者，故莫貴焉。

translations.literal: Its desire store it, thus nothing noble than this.
translations.idiomatic: This desire to preserve it—therefore nothing is more noble.

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: With Xuan Ji Yu Heng align seven govern, then heaven earth twenty eight lodges.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: With the Xuan Ji and Yu Heng to align the seven governances, this reaches the twenty-eight lodges of heaven and earth.

sentences.zh: 十母，十二子，鐘律調自上古。

translations.literal: Ten mothers, twelve children, bells pitches tune from ancient times.
translations.idiomatic: The ten mothers, twelve children, bells and pitches have been tuned since high antiquity.

translations.literal: Build pitches transport calendar make day degrees, can according measure.
translations.idiomatic: Establishing pitches, transporting the calendar, creating day degrees—can be relied upon and measured.

translations.literal: Combine tallies sections, connect morality way, then from this called.
translations.idiomatic: Combining tallies and sections, connecting the way of morality—this is what is called proceeding from this.
